tdloglikelihood#

tdloglikelihood.tdloglikelihood(param, x, ts)[source]#

Computes log-likelihood for the time-domain noise model.

Tdloglikelihood computes the log-likelihood function for obtaining the data matrix x, given the parameter vector param.

Parameters:

  • x (ndarray or matrix) – Data matrix.

  • param (ndarray) – A parameter vector including:

    logvndarray

    Log of noise parameters.

    mundarray

    Signal vector of size (n,).

    logandarray

    Log of amplitude vector of size (m,).

    etandarray

    Delay vector of size (m,).

  • ts (float) – Sampling time.

Returns:

  • nll (callable) – Negative log-likelihood function

  • gradnll (ndarray) – Gradient of the negative log-likelihood function

SI

next

tdnll
